title: Bloomberg Markets: WeWork Getting $4.4 Billion from SoftBank
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: WeWork Getting $4.4 Billion from SoftBank
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Mark Milian Technology Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing news from the world of venture capital, including WeWork Cos. agreeing to a $4.4 billion investment from SoftBank Group Corp. and its Vision Fund, part of an aggressive global expansion plan for the co-working startup.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
